# pictureInPictureDelegate

**Instance Property**

The Picture in Picture delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var pictureInPictureDelegate: (any AVPlayerViewPictureInPictureDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Configuring picture in picture

- **allowsPictureInPicturePlayback**: A Boolean value that determines whether the player view allows Picture in Picture playback.
- **AVPlayerViewPictureInPictureDelegate**: A protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to Picture in Picture playback events.
